OPENCTI_TOKEN.description: The token of the user who represents the connector in the OpenCTI platform.

CONNECTOR_SCOPE.description: The scope or type of data the connector is importing, either a MIME type or Stix Object (for information only).

CONNECTOR_TYPE.description: Should always be set to EXTERNAL_IMPORT for this connector.

CONNECTOR_LOG_LEVEL.description: Determines the verbosity of the logs.

THREATFOX_IMPORT_OFFLINE.description: Create records for indicators that are offline.

THREATFOX_CREATE_INDICATORS.description: Create indicators in addition to observables.

THREATFOX_X_OPENCTI_SCORE_IP.description: Set the x_opencti_score for IP observables.

THREATFOX_X_OPENCTI_SCORE_DOMAIN.description: Set the x_opencti_score for Domain observables.

THREATFOX_X_OPENCTI_SCORE_URL.description: Set the x_opencti_score for URL observables.

THREATFOX_X_OPENCTI_SCORE_HASH.description: Set the x_opencti_score for Hash observables.

THREATFOX_INTERVAL.description: [DEPRECATED] Interval in days between two scheduled runs of the connector.

THREATFOX_IOC_TO_IMPORT.description: List of IOC types to retrieve, available parameters: all_types, ip:port, domain, url, md5_hash, sha1_hash, sha256_hash
